name: onintopssconn

body.origin:
|- wss(cin(con0, ctop), cconn)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(con0, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), cconn))
-| diffsc(hs0, cin(con0, ctop))
-| diffsc(hs0, cconn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (On ⋂ Top)⊆ Conn
⊣ (hs0 ∈(On ⋂ Top)→ hs0 ∈ Conn)
⊣ d(hs0,(On ⋂ Top))
⊣ d(hs0, Conn)
